name: Bloom Master
description:
Bloom Master ~ From nothing to something

Made in 48 hours for the Unity FR Jam. The theme was "Start with nothing" (Vous commencez avec rien).

Leave your best score in the comments, and please give me advice and suggestions,
I plan to continue adding content to the game if you like it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music Credits

All the music used in this game are royalty free or used with the permission of the composer
